remarks: Construct a weak universe from a given set.  This version of ~ wunex has a simpler proof, but requires the axiom of regularity.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
wunex3.u $e |- U = ( R1 ` ( ( rank ` A ) +o _om ) ) $.
wunex3 $p |- ( A e. V -> ( U e. WUni /\ A C_ U ) ) $.
